scripts.backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn app.main:app --reload
scripts.backend:format: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && black . && isort .
scripts.backend:lint: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && flake8 app/ && mypy app/
scripts.backend:migrate: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && alembic upgrade head
scripts.backend:migrate:create: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && alembic revision --autogenerate -m
scripts.docs: echo 'Backend API docs: http://localhost:8000/docs' && echo 'Frontend: See aurea-frontend/README.md'
